attributes.action: make the SS Richard Montgomery safe
attributes.additional_details: The SS Richard Montgomery is a ship which sank in the thames estuary just after D day ,this ship has thousands of amunition on board and is still not safe today. If the ship exploded it would wipe out the whole of the isle of sheppey in a tidal wave and effect the coastline areas such as southend, faversham , whistable etc causing severe damage.Call upon the goverment to make this ship safe now!
